title: Purpose, disadvantages of federalism in Nig., Rus.

content.question:
Nigeria and Russia both have constitutionally established federal systems.

Describe one difference between a federal system and a unitary system.

Explain one common reason why both Nigeria and Russia adopted a federal system.

Describe two disadvantages of federalism in Nigeria.

Describe one institutional change that has limited federalism in Russia since 2000.

Explain why the Russian government has limited federalism since 2000.
